name: Arcade App: Beginner Path
description: Beginner path to build, test and share a MakeCode Arcade game.

activities.name: Open MakeCode Arcade
activities.description: Explore the editor, simulator, and create a new project.

activities.name: Create First Project
activities.description: Create and save a project named 'FirstArcade'.

activities.name: Create Player Sprite
activities.description: Design a player sprite using the sprite editor.

activities.name: Controller Movement
activities.description: Add controller movement blocks and test in the simulator.

activities.name: Create Tilemap
activities.description: Draw a level using tilemap editor.

activities.name: Add Enemy AI
activities.description: Make an enemy that patrols and interacts with player.

activities.name: Share Your Game
activities.description: Export and share the project link or GIF.
